org.honton.chas.datadog.apm

Class SpanBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.honton.chas.datadog.apm.SpanBuilder

  • public class SpanBuilder
extends Object
    An active Span builder. Provides methods to get and set the Span attributes. Some attributes, such as the start time, traceId, and parentId are final and cannot be modified.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SpanBuilder.Augmenter
      A callback used to augment newly constructed Spans
